title: Warden and Marauder skin discounts?
body: Is anyone know if there will be a discounted bundles for Warden and Marauder skins?

replies.body:
Bundle - Maybe
Discount - No

They already have a price of 750 RP Each. A Discount on them would be stupid.
Why the fk would they put discounts on already dirt cheap skins lmao?
